data.text: Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naa, nii é la ziɛzu ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-lɛnɛ gooi,
Kɛlɛ ziima vai ɠa ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-tɔgi,
Kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ gului nii siingai ziɛlaʋɛ,
É la ɠana ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti,
Naa ɠa é ba, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ti la losu zɔlɔɔga tukpɔɠaaleʋe voloi.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazu ɠa telebo nuiti ta-ʋelei ʋa.
